item.title: Sunak Hints at UK Crackdown on Airline-Style 'Drip Pricing'
item.description: UK Government Considers Crackdown on Drip Pricing The UK government is considering cracking down on a controversial pricing practice known as “drip pricing.” Drip pricing is when businesses advertise a low price for a product or service, but then add on extra fees for things like delivery or insurance.
